on reading compounds: 旧式【キュウシキ】old type, old style
新旧【シンキュウ】new and old, incoming and outgoing
懐旧【カイキュウ】reminiscence, nostalgia, thinking fondly of the past, recalling the old days
kun reading compounds: 古い【ふるい】old, aged, ancient, antiquated, antique, timeworn, long, since long ago, time-honored, of the distant past, long-ago, stale, threadbare, hackneyed, corny, old-fashioned, outmoded, out-of-date
